00020 using System;

00028 namespace Crossfade
00029 {   
00032         class play_pic : IPlayer
00033         {
00034                 string filepath = null;
00035                 float position = 0;
00036                 //int ft = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.Fadetime;
00037                 int picshowtime = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.PictureShowTime;
00038 
00039                 public play_pic()
00040                 {
00041                 }
00046                 public void open(ref Media media)
00047                 {
00048                         media.Length = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.PictureShowTime;
00049                         setFilePathFromUri(media.uri);
00050                         
00051                 }
00056                 private void setFilePathFromUri(Uri uri)
00057                 {
00058                         if (uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile &&
00059                                 (uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".jpg") ||
00060                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".bmp") ||
00061                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".png") ||
00062                                 uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".gif")))
00063                         {
00064                                 this.filepath = (uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile) ? (uri.LocalPath.ToString()) : (uri.ToString());
00065                         }
00066                         else
00067                         {
00068                                 throw new ArgumentException("play_pic::open: Unsupported URI: " + uri);
00069                         }
00070 
00071                 }
00075                 public void play()
00076                 {
00077                         try
00078                         {
00079                                 FileStream fs = new FileStream(filepath, FileMode.Open);
00080                                 if (fs != null)
00081                                 {
00082                                         position = 0;
00083                                         PictureBox picbox;
00084                                         Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(fs);
00085                                         picbox = Program.gui.getDrawingCanvas();
00086                                         picbox.SizeMode = PictureBoxSizeMode.Zoom;
00087                                         picbox.Image = bmp;
00088                                         picbox.Refresh();
00089                                         fs.Close();
00090                                 }
00091                         }
00092                         catch (IOException ex)
00093                         {
00094                                 MessageBox.Show("Error: Could not read file from disk. Original error: " + ex.Message);
00095                         }
00096                 }
00100         public void stop()
00101                 {
00102                         position = 0;
00103                 }
00108                 public void setPaused(bool state) { }
00109 
00113                 public bool getPaused() { return false; }
00114 
00119                 public void setMuted(bool state) { }
00120 
00124                 public bool getMuted() { return false; }
00125 
00130         public void setPosition(float pos) 
00131                 {
00132                         position = position + pos;
00133                 }
00134 
00139         public float getPosition() 
00140                 {
00141                         return position; 
00142                 }
00143 
00148                 public void setVolume(float volume) { }
00149 
00154         public float getVolume() { return 1.0f; }
00155 
00159                 public void tick()
00160                 {
00161                         position = Math.Min(getLength(), position + 250);
00162 
00163                         if (position == getLength())
00164                         {
00165                                 stop();
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168 
00172                 public bool getIsFading() { return false; }
00173 
00178         public void setFadetime(int ft) { }
00179 
00184         public float getLength()
00185                 {
00186                         return picshowtime;
00187                 }
00188 
00194         public void setPicshowtime(int picst)
00195                 {
00196                         picshowtime = picst;
00197                 }
00198         }
